title: Help with picking CSE Electives
content:
So I have already undertaken MIDS electives in 5th sem and would prefer to continue with the same.

E3 - NLP, Image Processing, digital twin and extended reality, Algo for info retrieval 

E4- Deep Learning, Meta Learning for graph abstraction, Mobile and autonomous robotics 

Which ones are the easiest to score in terms of grades, also assignments etc? Could u if possible rank these in some order

comments.body: In E3 Algorithms for information retrieval(AIWR) is an easy subject, in E4 deep learning surprisingly was easy for our batch(2024) and Network analysis and mining(NAM) was an easy subject.
